Articles.Content: I want to know if it's possible to generate mesh in-game. Ex: In the VAB you right click on a cylinder and set one side to a certain shape and the other side to an other shape.

7 hours ago, Mathrilord said:

I want to know if it's possible to generate mesh in-game. Ex: In the VAB you right click on a cylinder and set one side to a certain shape and the other side to an other shape.

Not sure about the same part but here are a couple of plugins that change mesh in game  https://github.com/blowfishpro/B9PartSwitch and https://github.com/linuxgurugamer/PartUtilities

There's also procedural parts, although they focus on tanks, structural, and to a lesser extent SRBs.

I've always wanted a proper procedural engine mod, but I'm not sure how to maintain simplicity while still offering enough options and staying balanced in both career and sandbox.
